character.noteList: Dwarf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Advantage on saves vs poison, poison damage resistance • Double proficiency bonus to History checks concerning stonework (even if not proficient) • Battleaxe, handaxe, throwing hammer, warhammer proficiency Gain 1 extra hit point per level Folk Hero Feature: • Commoners are willing to shelter you from some trouble Class Features: • Double proficiency with chosen skills/tools (Deception, Persuasion) • Sneak Attack (3d6) • Understand a secret language • You can dash, disengage, or hide as a bonus action • Rogue Archetype: Mastermind • You gain fluency with two languages and proficiency with a gaming set, disguise kit, and forger's set • Can make yourself sound like a local • Use help action on targets within 30ft as a bonus action • Observant: You gain +5 to passive perception and investigation, can read lips, and gain +1 to either Int or Wis • You can use a reaction to take half damage when hit by a foe that you see ⊠Light Armor ⊠Battleaxes, Handaxes, Throwing Hammers, Warhammers Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords ⊠Smith's Tools OR Brewer's Supplies OR Mason's Tools Thieves' Tools One type of artisan's tools Vehicles (land) Disguise kit Forgery kit One gaming set ⊠Common, Dwarvish ⊠leather armor daggers (2) thieves' tools rapier OR shortsword shortbow + 20 arrows OR shortsword burglar's pack OR dungeoneer's pack OR explorer's pack set of artisan's tools shovel iron pot set of common clothes belt pouch ⊠⊠Rogue 5⊠Hill Dwarf⊠Folk Hero⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Hanseld⊠Rogue 5⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠0
